title: The.Sun.at.Night.RIP-ALiAS
description:
The Sun at Night RIP-ALiAS
==========================

Publisher: Minicore Studios
----------
Developer: Minicore Studios
----------
Genre: Action, Adventure, Platformer
------
Release name: The.Sun.at.Night.RIP-ALiAS
-------------
Size: 367MB
-----

Description:
------------
The Sun at Night is a 2D action platformer starring Laika the space dog. Diverging from the real Soviet history which saw Laika's unfortunate demise on board Sputnik II, The Sun at Night takes place in an alternate history where the Soviets have become a technologically advanced empire and taken over most of the Western world.

Gameplay is spread out across four huge, ready-to-explore levels full of danger and intrigue. Guide Laika through this narrative involving player choice, upgradable weapons and abilities, and a unique defensive system that turns enemies against themselves. The world of The Sun at Night comes alive via its beautiful hand-drawn art and animation. The official soundtrack is a sprawling collection of songs by acclaimed chip composer Jared Blondeau
